Happy Birthday to George McClellan Jr, our debonair mayor from 1904-09. He famously drove the first Manhattan IRT subway train in Oct 1904.
Barneys NY debuts new Gaga holiday windows. The company (opened 1923) only started selling ladies clothes 35 years ago! @BarneysNY @ladygaga

A great @PBS documentary, if heavily weighed towards 'Midnight In Paris' w. more emphasis on its box office than its quality. #woodyallen
What made 2002's 'Hollywood Ending' the very worst? The month it opened, Woody was in court suing his old partner Jean Doumanian #woodyallen
Scarlett Johansson is allergic to wheat. Don't say you didn't learn anything this week. #woodyallen
This documentary is hilariously dismissing his dark period, as though those films never happened. #woodyallen
'Celebrity', on top of Leo and Charlize, also starred Donald Trump, The Don's second big NY film after 'Home Alone 2: Lost in New York'.
'Everyone Says I Love You': the funeral scene filmed at Campbells Funeral Parlor (at Madison/81), known for its private celebrity services.
Bullets Over Broadway: one of the best, and martini scene filmed at my favorite NY bar Old Town Bar near Union Square.pic.twitter.com/cKLjGDaF
Recycling in action. "We did not build anything for Bullets Over Broadway. Everything was found and occasionally supplemented.” #woodyallen
Shadows and Fog. (Ugh!) Filmed at Kaufman Astoria Studios, on BIGGEST set ever built at the time (26,000 sq ft) #woodyallen @KaufmanAstoria
In 'Husbands and Wives', yes, that's the original @DeanAndDeLuca on Prince Street. #woodyallen
In "Hannah and her Sisters' Woody takes Dianne to see Bobby Short,  famous for performing at Cafe Carlyle, where Woody now performs jazz!

According to Woody, the 'original' September w. the other cast is 'gone'. So no special edition DVD there.

'Broadway Danny Rose' I nominate for one of Wood's best uses of a New York landmark (Carnegie Deli) @CarnegieDeli #woodyallen
Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy: Sure he meets Mia, but then she's nominated for Razzie for Worst Actress for the part. An omen? #woodyallen
Woody plays jazz at Cafe Carlyle but he used to play at Michael's (7th/47th) in '90s. I went then, blew half my rent on dinner. #woodyallen
"Pasta is an expression of Italian Neo-Realistic starch" Woody's '79 @newyorker article 'Fabrizio's: Criticism and Response' '#woodyallen
"I know I've romanticized the city. I constantly run into Europeans whose only sense of NY comes from Manhattan and Annie Hall." Woody, 1986
Not only was Bea Arthur in Woody Allen flop 1981 play 'The Floating Light Bulb'; it was her LAST non-solo show on Broadway ever #woodyallen
@PBS documentary on Woody Allen continues tonite! Featuring Mia, Soon-Yi and the best and worst of his later years....
